item.description:
The law of attraction is the name given to the belief that "like attracts like" and that by focusing on positive or negative thoughts, one can bring about positive or negative results.

Therefore, what is the Power behind Positive Thinking verses Negative Thinking? Why is it to so important to stay Positive when life presents difficult issues?

Positive thinking is a mental attitude that admits into the mind, thoughts, words and images that are conductive to growth, expansion and success. It is a mental attitude that expects good and favorable results. A positive mind anticipates happiness, joy, health and a successful outcome of every situation and action. Whatever the mind expects, it finds.

Roberta Robinson will be speaking to us about Positive Thinking/How it affects every aspect of your life; from stress management through Reiki/Meditation/Health & Spirituality & other alternative therapies.

Roberta is a Reiki Master Teacher (Karuna Reiki/Usui Reiki/Shambala), as well as a Master Teacher in Magnified Healing; Yuen Energetics Practitioner; Reconnective Healing Practitioner & student/teacher of Law of Attraction. She is a past President of the Board of Directors for Center for Balance, an Integrative Medicine Healing Center, Member of the Steering Committee for Holy Spirit Catholic Community, a Hospice Volunteer, Member of the Multi Cultural Coalition on Aging as well as a Member of the Somerville-Cambridge, Metro-North and West Suburban Alzheimer Partnerships. She is in the process of preparing to do a TV Show on local cable tv.

Roberta has manifested the job of her lifetime and today lives in peace, harmony and love.

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there!
Please call for if you are joining us for the first time.
Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

item.name: Guest Speaker Roberta Robinson: The Power Behind Positive Thinking
